pkgmetadata.longdescription: Construct ANANSE GRN-Analysis Seurat // Enables gene regulatory network (GRN) analysis on single cell clusters, using the GRN analysis software 'ANANSE', Xu et al.(2021) doi:10.1093/nar/gkab598. Export data from 'Seurat' objects, for GRN analysis by 'ANANSE' implemented in 'snakemake'. Finally, incorporate results for visualization and interpretation.
